inscription:

in plate in black: [Pietro Cortona Pinxit.  Wm. Walker Scupsit/ CHRIST appearing to MARY in the GARDEN/ From the Original Picture Painted by Pietro da Cortona, in the Collection/ of the Right Honorable the Earl of Oxford at Houghton./ Vol II. No. 12  Size of the Picture 1F 8 by 1F 91/2 in height. John Boydell excudit 1766];  in pencil on sheet: [1-310]

title: Christ Appearing to Mary in the Garden
